pages.text:
Title: On the closed hull of subsets of inductive limits

Abstract: The present note investigates the closed hull of subsets M contained in the (unrestricted) inductive limit E[T] of topological vector spaces £Jra], aE. A. Sufficient conditions for the validity of M= u Mr\Ea Ta are given. These conditions are discussed by examples, and it is shown that oeA there is not any redundance among them. Applications to F-linked topologies and sequence spaces are indicated. Futhermore, some inaccuracies contained in some of the standard text books are corrected. §
